page.title: 07CLUBS GOLDSBOROUGH AREA
page.content: There are several clubs in our area. Several use the{Cricket Club}for their meetings:the{W.I.}has 65 members who meet each month,the{Toddler Group}who meet weekly use the club and the pitch and the{school}who make good use of the ground.The{Club}was founded very early this century(there was a ladies cricket team in 1907).The{Cricket Club has a football team. Our block contains{Knaresboro'Town { {F.C.,}having its first game at{Manse {Lane}in 1953.The Knaresborough{Squash {Club}has 240 members.It has 4 courts,a lounge and a bar. { Knaresborough Piscatorials}fish in the disused quarry to the North-East of our block. { 24 Brownies }meet in the school. The Goldsborough{N.S.P.C.C.}started in 1978 raises approximately Â£800 per year.
